channel.title: Help On Server Skill Capes!
channel.description: I need to know some codes, for like all the skill capes. Any kind. If possible the ones like in RuneScape with their look, and emote. And need to know where to put the code. So if you can help me, I'd be grateful. If you can support the Skill capes like RuneScapes, emote and look the same, I will make you an admin on my server and forums (www.ploxiescape.co.nr)! Thank You!!

I know what they are, just where to get ,and what to do with them.

Can anyone help? ><
